name: janitor.technology
description: The fastest development system in the world.

scripts.rebase: git pull -q --rebase origin master && git submodule -q update --rebase && npm update
scripts.prestart: npm stop && touch janitor.log janitor.pid && chmod 600 janitor.log janitor.pid
scripts.start: if [ -z "$SCRIPT" ] ; then printf "Run which Janitor script? [join/app]:" && read SCRIPT ; fi ; node "$SCRIPT" >> janitor.log 2>&1 & printf "$!\n" > janitor.pid
scripts.poststart: printf "[$(date -uIs)] Background process started (PID $(cat janitor.pid), LOGS $(pwd)/janitor.log).\n"
scripts.stop: if [ -e janitor.pid -a -n "$(ps h $(cat janitor.pid))" ] ; then kill $(cat janitor.pid) && printf "[$(date -uIs)] Background process stopped (PID $(cat janitor.pid)).\n" ; fi ; rm -f janitor.pid
scripts.watch: watch-run --initial --pattern 'app.js,package.json,api/**,lib/**,templates/**' --stop-on-error npm run app & tailf janitor.log -n 0
